content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown)

### Coal extraction point at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position unknown)

### Iron plate production setup at position (unknown)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position unknown) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Assembling machine (position unknown) for crafting iron gear wheels and iron sticks

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient materials
- Ensure you have enough required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plate is needed for crafting iron-gear-wheels.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
